translation:
Most Illustrious Sir

Having been informed by Ensign Bolilho that he had delivered into the custody of this garrison two prisoners under my orders, one named Lúcio de Braga, I send him to Your Excellency in Rio Grande to be deported according to the order of the Most Excellent Sir Your Excellency.

God keep Your Excellency

Camp near Canguçu, May 16, 1844.

God keep Your Excellency Camp near Canguçu, May 16, 1844.  
Most Illustrious Sir Luís José Ferreira  
Lieutenant Colonel Commander of the 8th Battalion of Hunters.  
Francisco Pedro de Abreu
